name: Revolve (itch) (GudBoiNero)
description:
The controls are pretty simple!

LMB to Shoot, and RMB to Dash

Please report any bugs you find or some critiques you might have. Any suggestions for content would be appreciated as well since this didn't ever have any plans. It was more of a small game that meant to have a very tiny scope and it will stay that way. However only having one or two enemies is a little too small in my opinion.

Anyways,

Thanks a lot for checking this out! It means a lot and I hope you enjoy this work in progress game.
